title: Bug Crashes/Repair/Remake
body:
I have had this problem 4 or 5 times in the last 3 months, as soon as as countdown in champ select completes i get an error and i start repairing, which usually fixes just in time for me to join a game that is being remade because i was AFK. id like help fixing the problem because I'm sure it's on my end somehow

i don't think doing that many remakes in 3 months or so span is forgivable and id like to not impose remakes on teams and would like not to end up on a suspension on something that is an under the hood problem that i can foresee in any way to my knowledge https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/328663532675792897/389312230199656460/unknown.png

replies.body:
Often times when this happens it can be traced back to not having a super stable connection while trying to patch. If your connection hiccups a lot during patching, it can miss or damage certain files and then needs to repatch like this at the WORST of times. 

Try to make sure you use a steady connection, possibly switching to ethernet while downloading these patches or repairing. You might also want to go through the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a precaution too!

thank you,

ill see if i can make it less of a problem on my end, i do click send error report so im sure you got your end covered xD
